dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 2370 IH: Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Scott of Virginia introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the juvenile accountability block grants program through fiscal year 2016.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Juvenile Accountability Block Grants Program Reauthorization Act of 2013.

section.header: Reauthorization of Juvenile Accountability Block Grants program through fiscal year 2016
section.text: Part R of title I of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 3796ee et seq.) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in section 1810(a), by inserting and each of the fiscal years 2014 through 2016 after 2009; and
in section 1810(b), by inserting and each of the fiscal years 2014 through 2016 after 2004.
